name: Pixel Slayer
description:
Pixel Slayer is a unique idle RPG game with various gameplay possibilities.

Slay monsters to earn resources. Buy upgrades to spawn more monsters and increase your reward. Feel stuck? Convert resources into gold to spend it for more powerful upgrades inside the prestige shop! Infinite fun, endless possibilities.

Benefits:
  • Endless gameplay possibilities
  • Almost one hundred various monsters to defeat
  • No exponential prices increase for upgrades
  • Fair rewards and goals
  • Fancy pixel graphics
  • Calm and relaxing ambient music
  • Global ranking system and achievements

Tired of boring and infinite idle games? Then try Pixel Slayer and have fun!
